item.title: Former GOP Sen. Ben Sasse says he has stage-four pancreatic cancer
item.description: Republican Ben Sasse represented Nebraska in the U.S. Senate from 2015 to 2023, then became president of the University of Florida.

item.title: What are today's mortgage interest rates: December 23, 2025?
item.description: Mortgage rates are sliding as 2025 winds down. Here's where today's purchase and refinance rates have landed.

item.title: Instacart to end AI price tests for retailers following investigation
item.description: Instacart had drawn criticism for testing an AI-based system that enabled retailers to charge different prices for the same grocery items.

item.title: What's the CD account interest rate forecast for 2026? Here's what experts expect.
item.description: CD rates are still competitive despite recent drops, but where they head in 2026 will depend on numerous factors.

item.title: DOJ releases huge new set of Epstein files with many mentions of Trump
item.description: The Justice Department early Tuesday released more than 11,000 additional documents and photos from the Jeffrey Epstein files. Follow live updates her...
